newsitem.title: ZAIRE: Thirty killed in road crashes near Zaire capital.
newsitem.headline: Thirty killed in road crashes near Zaire capital.

text.p: Thirty people were killed in two separate road accidents at the same spot in a suburb of Zaire's capital Kinshasa, state radio said on Thursday.
Two trucks heading for the city from the western province of Bandundu crashed on Tuesday and Wednesday nights into a vehicle abandoned on a road near Kinshasa airport.
Both trucks carried goods and passengers. Thirty people were killed and several people were also injured in Wednesday night's crash, the radio said.
